name: Arcane Ascension
description:
Ascend the arcane tower! Climb as high as you can, but avoid enemies and avoid falling down through the falling floor tiles! WASD/Arrow keys to move, you attack by moving into enemies (you also get attacked when enemies move into you!). Reach the special exit tile to ascend to the next floor.

This is a submission to Ludum Dare 42, our first ever game jam! You can find the page here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/arcane-ascension

Thanks for playing!
